name: Taino Toro Grande Maduro
additionalNotes: Taino Classics are handmade by the Taino Indians. These famous Tabacaleros are commonly known for the creation of many Cuban cigar brands in the early 1900's. The Taino Indians migrated from Cuba to the Dominican Republic in the early 1960's during the Castro Revolution. Taino Classics are a superbly constructed medium strength vintage cigar with a rich smooth taste. The filler is a blend of our finest quality Dominican and Nicaraguan Cuban seed tobacco. Taino Classics are available in either USA Connecticut or Brazilian Maduro and come in 3 popular sizes. 25 per Bundle.
